segment.source: How to Install the MBAM 1.0 Group Policy Template
segment.target: How to Install the MBAM 1.0 Group Policy Template

segment.source: How to Install the MBAM 1.0 Group Policy Template
segment.target: How to Install the MBAM 1.0 Group Policy Template

segment.source: How to Install the MBAM 1.0 Group Policy Template
segment.target: How to Install the MBAM 1.0 Group Policy Template

segment.source: In addition to the server-related features of Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM), the server setup application includes an MBAM Group Policy template.
segment.target: In addition to the server-related features of Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM), the server setup application includes an MBAM Group Policy template.

segment.source: You can install this template on any computer that is capable of running the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC) or Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM).
segment.target: You can install this template on any computer that is capable of running the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC) or Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM).

segment.source: The following steps describe how to install the MBAM Group Policy template.
segment.target: The following steps describe how to install the MBAM Group Policy template.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Make sure that you use the 32-bit setup on 32-bit servers and the 64-bit setup on 64-bit servers.
segment.target: Make sure that you use the 32-bit setup on 32-bit servers and the 64-bit setup on 64-bit servers.

segment.source: To install the MBAM Group Policy template
segment.target: To install the MBAM Group Policy template

segment.source: Start the MBAM installation wizard; then, click Install on the Welcome page.
segment.target: Start the MBAM installation wizard; then, click Install on the Welcome page.

segment.source: Read and accept the Microsoft Software License Terms, and then click Next to continue the installation.
segment.target: Read and accept the Microsoft Software License Terms, and then click Next to continue the installation.

segment.source: By default, all MBAM features are selected for installation.
segment.target: By default, all MBAM features are selected for installation.

segment.source: Clear all feature options except for Policy Template, and then click Next to continue the installation.
segment.target: Clear all feature options except for Policy Template, and then click Next to continue the installation.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The installation wizard checks the prerequisites for your installation and displays the prerequisites that are missing.
segment.target: The installation wizard checks the prerequisites for your installation and displays the prerequisites that are missing.

segment.source: If all the prerequisites are met, the installation continues.
segment.target: If all the prerequisites are met, the installation continues.

segment.source: If a missing prerequisite is detected, you must resolve the missing prerequisite and then click Check prerequisites again.
segment.target: If a missing prerequisite is detected, you must resolve the missing prerequisite and then click Check prerequisites again.

segment.source: Once all prerequisites are met, the installation will resume.
segment.target: Once all prerequisites are met, the installation will resume.

segment.source: After the MBAM Setup wizard displays installation pages for the selected features, click Finish to close MBAM Setup.
segment.target: After the MBAM Setup wizard displays installation pages for the selected features, click Finish to close MBAM Setup.
